Key Match Events: Damian Lillard hit the go-ahead jump shot with 9.8 seconds left to give the Bucks the lead
Donovan Mitchell answered with a heart-breaking shot with 0.3 seconds remaining to get the 114-113 win for the Cavaliers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Fiserv Forum
Others: Damian Lillard finished with 41 points, four rebounds, and nine assists
Lillard was 13-for-24, including 10-for-15 from beyond the arc
Gary Trent Jr. did a wonderful job defending Donovan Mitchell in the final possession
